item.description:
=====

Read the entire description before you RSVP and answer all questions that are part of the RSVP. Failure to answer them will result in your removal from this event. If you RSVP from a mobile device the questions may not show up - use a computer to update your RSVP so you can answer them.

Your safety, and the safety of the group, is the most important thing. If you underestimate the demands of this event; overestimate your experience, knowledge, skills or abilities; or come unprepared you put yourself or others at risk – consider this before you decide to participate.

=====

Trip Information

We'll be hiking the Franconia Ridge loop going up the Old Bridle Path, across Franconia Ridge and down the Falling Waters trail. The total distance is 9 miles with a book time of 6.5 hours.

Weather

I will check the weather the day before the event. If it looks poor I'll cancel the trip by noontime. With an elevation change of 4000+ ft, the temperature can drop by 15 degrees or more from the bottom to the top of the mountain.

Gear

  • Food and Water, at least 2 Quarts.
  • Raincoat
  • Flashlight or headlamp.
  • Map + Compass.
  • First aid kit and emergency gear.

Location

Meet at the base of the trailhead across from the Lafayette campground. The hike will start at 9:00am so please arrive before then so you have time to prepare.

Dogs are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Boone the yellow Lab with a blue pack.
item.name: Franconia Ridge Loop
